sentence.Network_en: On many modern wooden boats, epoxy coatings will have been used as a base for varnishing.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多现代的木船将采用环氧涂层作底漆。

sentence.Network_en: Epoxy structures can be similarly identified , provided they are not fully alkylagted.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有完全烷基化的环氧结构也可以同样地加以鉴识.

sentence.Network_en: Two moles of epoxy react with one mole of A - 1100.
sentence.Network_cn: 两个克分子环氧与一个克分子A - 1100反应.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...时为因应LED加工需求时，也会使用不同材料特性的环氧树脂(Epoxy)。
注环氧树酯(epoxy)保护锁体。目前电磁锁的吸力强度以LB表示(磅)，测试的方法是静态加压。
当一个氧原子和碳链上两个相邻的或非相邻的碳原子相连接而形成环形体系时，称为环氧化合物。命名时用环氧（epoxy）作词头，写在母体烃名之前。最简单的环氧化合物是环氧乙烷。除环氧乙烷外，其它环氧化合物命名时还需用数字.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from epi- 'in addition' + oxy-

entry.def: Epoxy resin or adhesive contains an artificial substance which sets hard when it is heated or when pressure is applied to it.

means.word_mean: 1. a thermosetting resin; used chiefly in strong adhesives and coatings and laminates
